name: TDesign for web
description:
📢 Support All New Figma Features！

所有组件均支持 Figma 最新特性，Auto Layout 4.0 全新升级，Individual Strokes 描边定位让组件更合理。


🌈 Variants are coming

所有组件均可使用 Variants 进行配置，并且针对不同开发框架 API Props 一一对应，欢迎各角色同学使用体验，多提建议。


来自腾讯企业级设计体系，适用于中后台场景的 Figma 文件。


📄 Intro

Enterprise design system developed by Tencent. With TDesign component library, you can easily create new products and applications.


🌏 Website

https://tdesign.tencent.com

https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign


📮 Contact
